sections.heading: actions; applicability of sections
sections.text: Sections 25-824 to 25-824.03 shall apply unless attorney's fees are otherwise specifically provided by law, in which case the provision allowing the greater award shall prevail.SourceLaws 1987, LB 261, ยง 4.
